title: Request an Infant Bassinet on a Flight
description: A passenger traveling with an infant on a long-haul flight wants to request a bassinet.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's booking and verify the infant is on the reservation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the booking includes an infant.

tasks.description: Check if the aircraft has bassinet positions and if one is available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available bassinet seat at a bulkhead.

tasks.description: Add the bassinet request to the booking and assign the passenger to the appropriate seat.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the special request and changes the seat assignment.
